thread.title: Tapper: Is There Anyone in White House Who Can Tell Trump to ‘Stop with the Conspiracy Theories’?
thread.title_full: Tapper: Is There Anyone in White House Who Can Tell Trump to ‘Stop with the Conspiracy Theories’?

author: Josh Feldman
title: Tapper: Is There Anyone in White House Who Can Tell Trump to ‘Stop with the Conspiracy Theories’?
text:
video Tapper: Is There Anyone in White House Who Can Tell Trump to ‘Stop with the Conspiracy Theories’? by Josh Feldman | 5:34   
During a panel discussion today on President Trump ‘s unproven wiretapping claims — which he tore into earlier — CNN’s Jake Tapper asked if there’s anyone in the White House who can get the president to “cut it out”: 
I think that President Trump potentially could be an effective president… Is there anyone around him in the White House who can say ‘cut it out, focus on what’s important, stop with the conspiracy theories, stop with the nonsense?’ 
Washington Post reporter Abby Phillip said that Trump could certainly be more focused on the health care, but we’re talking about this because it’s “a case of his own making.” 
Watch above, via CNN.
